revised_title: The Role and Development of Medical Technology in Modern Medicine
tldr: This article discusses the importance of technology in the development of modern medicine and its impact on clinical practice. It explores various diagnostic and therapeutic techniques, including the use of flexible instruments, computer-aided decision making, and imaging technologies. The author emphasizes the need for better communication and evaluation of new technologies to ensure their appropriate use and control in medical practice.
